# osc_drakkan_sftpgo_resource (Resource)

Introducing SFTPGo - the versatile solution supporting SFTP, HTTP&#x2F;S, FTP&#x2F;S, WebDAV &amp; multiple cloud storages. Secure, scalable &amp; easy to manage.
